title.narrative: Support for Accelerated Growth and Increased Competitiveness (SAGIC)

description.narrative: In partnership with International Resources Group, Relief International is working to facilitate access to capital/credit to promote food security and build Senegal’s agribusiness subsectors. To achieve this, the activities proposed herein are designed to stimulate the demand and supply of financial services along the priority agriculture and livestock supply chains and improve the macro policy and business environment. The SAGIC team is focusing on building up value chains “from both ends." Priority agricultural and livestock areas have been analyzed to assess which upgraded skills are required for banking practitioners. Conversely, in order to reach out to more rural shareholders and sustain their growth,the SAGIC Team is reaching out to and partner with microfinance institutions and work with them to build their capacity to develop new market-driven products and raise long term resources in a cost effective way. Developing demand oriented subsectors, and from these value chains, in priority areas or sectors is also an equal priority. Actors include major international banks, exporting firms, infrastructure and transportation firms, etc. Building the economic bridges “from both ends” is creating the foundation for a program of demonstration models that require training as well as financial savvy.
